description: Inappropriate relationship at the workplace can be messy. The first candidate learned that from the first hand. This well-built guy had very manly face and physique. I wasn´t sure if I should make him my naughty proposition. And rightfully so, he was really mad. My secretary told me he was very rude to her as he was leaving. I hoped the next candidate will show more class. Luckily it was a fine young gentleman. I was still a bit shaken from the first guy so I tried to test the water first with some innocent flattery. As he responded very well I described him the situation and the "special discount" I can give him. He was a bit shy at first but eventually he enjoyed it. At least I think. I couldn´t get enough of his beautiful footballer legs. Simply gorgeous.
title: Dirty Scout 13
